verses.name: John 15:19
verses.text: If ye were of the world, the world would love his own: but because ye are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hateth you.

verses.name: John 15:20
verses.text: Remember the word that I said unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord. If they have persecuted me, they will also persecute you; if they have kept my saying, they will keep yours also.

verses.name: John 15:21
verses.text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name’s sake, because they know not him that sent me.
